lunges: stand tall with feet hip-width apart, step forward with one foot, and lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, keeping your front knee aligned with your ankle and your back knee close to the ground
toe_touches_front: stand with feet hip-width apart, shift your hips back, and gently reach for your toes, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent
squats: stand with feet shoulder-width apart, engage your core, keep your chest up and back straight, and lower your hips as if sitting in a chair, ensuring knees track over toes and don't cave in
toe_touches_sides: stand with feet hip-width apart, arms at your sides, and slightly bend your knees. Then, reach for your opposite foot with your opposite hand, keeping your back straight and core engaged, and return to the starting position
arm_raises: stand or sit tall with feet shoulder-width apart, maintain a neutral spine, and engage your core, keeping your shoulders relaxed and back
standing_crunches: instructstand with feet shoulder-width apart, engage your core, and place hands behind your head (or fingertips behind ears with elbows wide). Then, curl your shoulders toward your waist while maintaining a neutral spine and a slightly tucked chin, engaging your abs throughout the movementions
